item.description:
DARE Luncheon

11:30 - 12:00 PM - Open Networking

12:00 -12:30 - Lunch Is Served

12:30 - 12:45 - Introductions

Tell us in less than 1 minute who you are, what you do, what you're promoting so we can help you build your business!

12:45 - 1:15 - Presentation


Secrets to Passionate Partnership

Inspired Relationships At Work AND Home

In this powerful presentation, Cupid’s Executive Officer, Cheri Valentine will be exposing her secret ingredients to create and cultivate relationships that sizzle.

Whether you are single, married to the mother or father of your children, a single parent or in a blended family you will walk away with strategies and tools that you can implement today to improve the relationships in your life and create the harmonious, passionate, and thriving relationships that you desire even when you are building a new business, a seasoned entrepreneur or anywhere in between.

In this inspirational and informational presentation, Cheri will:

·         Discuss how to have inspired relationships at home and at work.

·         Reveal her holistic and integrative process to turn on your love light.  Without this, you will not get the results you want in your relationships.

·         Explain how you can avoid the same relationship mistakes from your past.

·         Disclose the most effective way to clear the hurdles you have to love and the relationships you crave.

About Cheri Valentine

Cheri is a trusted mentor to men and women who came close to giving up on love, and with her guidance found the confidence and energy to attract and keep the right partner and enjoy rewarding relationships in their life.

With a BS in Education and her training as a Strategic Attraction and Relationship Coach, Emotional Freedom Techniques (EFT) Specialist, Passion Test Facilitator, Passion Test for Kids & Teens Facilitator and Energy Healer, Cheri provides unique integrative perspective into human nature and what drives individuals to and holds them back from love.

Cheri’s education and training is combined with intuition, compassionate listening, empathetic understanding, insightful and pointed questions which easily allows Cheri to easily guide individuals and groups to deliberately create passionate partnerships at work and at home.

group.name: Dare To Be Phenomenal's Success Minded Women's Network

item.name: DARE Networking Luncheon
